modified_SQL_query: SELECT ADD(ADD(FBA_CNT, FSH_CNT), FUP_CNT) AS RecordCount FROM (subquery_1) AS FBA JOIN (subquery_2) AS FSH ON EQ(1, 1) JOIN (subquery_3) AS FUP ON EQ(1, 1)

subquery_dictionary.subquery_1: SELECT COUNT(*) AS FBA_CNT FROM staging.FTP_Base
subquery_dictionary.subquery_2: SELECT COUNT(*) AS FSH_CNT FROM staging.FTP_Shocks
subquery_dictionary.subquery_3: SELECT COUNT(*) AS FUP_CNT FROM staging.FTP_Unpivot
